title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1977 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the Control of Fishing for Salmon Order 2021 (S.I. No. 102 
of 2021) by substitution of a new Schedule for Schedule 1. The effect of this 
amendment is to increase the number of District Draft Net Licences available in 
the Letterkenny District from 2 to 3.
